github.$comment: GitHub token from environment variable. Generate at: https://github.com/settings/tokens
github.$comment_auth: Token is required for API operations (gh CLI). For git operations, you can use either HTTPS+token or SSH keys.
github.$comment_ssh: If using SSH: Token still required for API ops. Git push/pull will use SSH keys automatically from ~/.ssh/

gitlab.$comment: GitLab token from environment variable. Generate at: https://gitlab.com/-/profile/personal_access_tokens

defaults.$comment_default_branch: Default base branch for new feature branches
defaults.$comment_protected: Branches that require extra protection (no force push, merge warnings)
defaults.$comment_format: Commit message format: conventional|faber. FABER includes additional metadata.
defaults.$comment_signed: Require GPG-signed commits. Set to true for compliance.
defaults.$comment_auto_delete: Automatically delete branches after successful merge

remote.name: origin
remote.$comment_upstream: Automatically set upstream when pushing new branches

defaults.$comment_push_sync: Strategy when push fails due to non-fast-forward: auto-merge|pull-rebase|pull-merge|manual|fail
defaults.$comment_pull_prefer_remote: auto-merge-prefer-remote (default): Remote changes win in conflicts - respects committed/pushed work
defaults.$comment_pull_prefer_local: auto-merge-prefer-local: Local changes win in conflicts
defaults.$comment_pull_rebase: rebase: Rebase local commits onto remote - cleaner history
defaults.$comment_pull_manual: manual: User resolves conflicts manually - most control
defaults.$comment_pull_fail: fail: Abort if conflicts detected - safest option

pr.$comment_work_id: Require work item reference in PRs

ci_polling.$comment_enabled: Enable CI polling for pr-review --wait-for-ci flag
ci_polling.$comment_timeout: Maximum seconds to wait for CI (default: 900 = 15 minutes)
ci_polling.$comment_initial_delay: Initial delay before first check (allows CI to start)

cleanup.$comment_inactive: Days of inactivity before branch is considered stale
cleanup.$comment_exclude: Branch patterns to exclude from cleanup

branch_creation.$comment_auto: Automatically create branches during Frame phase
branch_creation.$comment_work_id: Include work item ID in branch name

commit_metadata.$comment_phase: Include FABER phase in commit metadata

pr_creation.$comment_pr_auto: Automatically create PR during Release phase
pr_creation.$comment_metadata: Include FABER metadata in PR body
pr_creation.$comment_draft: Create PRs as drafts until workflow approval

hooks.$comment: Hook configuration for auto-commit and unified stop handler

auto_commit.$comment_enabled: Enable auto-commit on session stop (default: true)
auto_commit.$comment_throttle: Minimum minutes between auto-commits (0 = no throttle)

unified.$comment_enabled: Use unified stop handler (combines commit + comment hooks)

github.$comment_gh: Use gh CLI for GitHub operations (recommended)

pr_checks.$comment_ci: Require CI checks to pass before merge
pr_checks.$comment_reviews: Minimum number of approving reviews (0 to disable)

gitlab.$comment_glab: Use glab CLI for GitLab operations (recommended)
